Config.Instructions: Select each bubble to learn more about solutions you can use to overcome challenges while creating mixed media artworks.
Config.Caption: Assemblage Solutions
copyright: Mixed media painting of trees by river by AnnBaldwin © 2011 iStock
Gold and Blue Dots by seraficus © 2011 iStock
Assorted pieces of leather by andreonegin © 2017 iStock
Colorful Carving Paper Shapes by kotoffei © 2017 iStock

Bubbles.text: If you think you’ve made a mistake while creating your artwork, just add another layer of paint over top. Doing this will add more texture to your artwork.
Drawing over top of your artwork can change how you see a mistake. Using a dark pen to add a border can add interest and create texture.
Try gluing textured materials, like fabric, or different types of paper onto your artwork to cover up a mistake.
Try cutting a hole right out of your artwork and filling it with something else. You can even reuse the piece that you cut out somewhere else in your artwork.

TextVersion:
Assemblage Solutions

If you think you’ve made a mistake while creating your artwork, just add another layer of paint over top. Doing this will add more texture to your artwork.

Image description:

Drawing over top of your artwork can change how you see a mistake. Using a dark pen to add a border can add interest and create texture.

Image description:

Try gluing textured materials, like fabric, or different types of paper onto your artwork to cover up a mistake.

Image description:

Try cutting a hole right out of your artwork and filling it with something else. You can even reuse the piece that you cut out somewhere else in your artwork.
